name: Cyber Breakout - Less is More
description:
You are a criminal in a futuristic city, and you recently broke out of a high-security prison. Use the pistol you stole, or the weapons of the enemies you killed to survive as long as you can, but be careful, the more ammo you have, and the bigger the gun, the slower you move!

Controls :

• WASD/Arrow Keys to move

• Mouse to Aim

• Left Click to Shoot

• R/RIght Click to Reload

This is my first ever GameJam, and one of the first games that I've released after starting to learn unity almost 2 weeks ago! I made this game to prove to myself that I could make this game, and wanted to learn from this experience! So any feedback would be amazing!
